snippet: United Nations officials said experts from the organization would go to Syria as soon as possible to investigate three clashes in which chemical weapons are suspected of having been used.
abstract: United Nations officials say experts from the organization will go to Syria as soon as possible to investigate three clashes in which chemical weapons are suspected of having been used.
lead_paragraph: United Nations officials said experts from the organization would go to Syria as soon as possible to investigate three clashes in which chemical weapons are suspected of having been used.

headline.main: U.N. Team in Syria Is Set to Investigate Accusations of Chemical Attacks
headline.print_headline: Syria: U.N. Team Is Set to Investigate Accusations of Chemical Attacks
